price: 87. Y ese día se someterán completamente a (la decisión de) Al-lah y serán abandonados por los ídolos que inventaron (y no les sirvieron de nada).
arabic: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alqaw ilā al-lahi yawma-idhin al-salama waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
